title: Cosmic Legends of the East
description: Ancient and Modern Legends about the History of Ancient Civilizations, Description ‘The Cosmic Legends of the East’ is the best collection of Ancient Vedic Manuscripts, translated on the modern language from Sanskrit, via the Teaching of H.Blavatsky ( Theosophy), H.Roerich ( Living Ethics), and constructed by the members of International Theosophical Lodge for the True Lovers of Mystic Arts and the History of Ancient Civilizations. Wish You the Best surfing ever to study this Holy Scriptures for our Modern Time…))) Blessings of Light, Ana-Stasi Fennell, MA in Ed. The member of International Theosophical Lodge
author: Stepan Stulginsky
